00324 namespace std {
00327   template<>
00328   struct less<GHom> {
00329     bool operator()(const GHom &g1,const GHom &g2) const{
00330       return g1<g2;
00331     }
00332   };

00335 /**********************************************************************/
00339 class _GHom{
00340 private:
00342   friend class GHom;
00344   friend class Hom;
00347   mutable int refCounter;
00352   mutable bool marking;
00356   mutable bool immediat;
00357  
00358   GDDD eval_skip(const GDDD &) const;
00359   
00360 public:
00361 
00362 
00366      virtual bool
00367     skip_variable(int) const
00368     {
00369         return false;
00370     }
00373     virtual bool
00374     is_selector() const
00375     {
00376         return false;
00377     }
00378 
00380       virtual GHom invert (const GDDD & ) const {
00381         // default = raise assert
00382         if ( is_selector() ) {
00383           // A default implmentation is provided for selector homomorphisms, overloadable.
00384           // sel^-1 (s) = pot - sel(pot) + s = ((pot-sel(pot)) + id)
00385           // return  ( (pot - GHom(this)(pot))+ GHom::id );
00386           return this;
00387         }
00388         // No default implem if ! is_selector 
00389         std::cerr << "Cannot invert homomorphism : " ;
00390         print (std::cerr);
00391         std::cerr << std::endl ;        
00392         assert(0); 
00393         return GHom(GDDD::null);
00394       }
00395 
00396 
00399   _GHom(int ref=0,bool im=false):refCounter(ref),marking(false),immediat(im){};
00401   virtual ~_GHom(){};
00402 
00403 
00407   virtual bool operator==(const _GHom &h) const=0;
00412   virtual size_t hash() const=0;
00413 
00414   // for use by unique table : return new MyConcreteClassName(*this);
00415   virtual _GHom * clone () const =0 ;
00416 
00420   virtual GDDD eval(const GDDD &)const=0;
00421 
00423   virtual void mark() const{};
00424 
00425   virtual GHom compose (const GHom &r) const ;
00426 
00427   virtual void print (std::ostream & os) const = 0;
00428 protected:
00429   
00430   // Enable access to the concrete GHom for _GHom homorphisms
00431   const _GHom*
00432   get_concret(const GHom& ghom) const
00433   {
00434     return ghom.concret;
00435   }
00436   
00437   
00438 };
